notable_quotes: MSNBC's Donny Deutsch pressed a reporter to name names after she reopened the Jeffrey Epstein sex abuse scandal with a series of bombshell reports.

analysis.summary: Paul Krassner forwards an AlterNet news article discussing MSNBC's Donny Deutsch pressing a reporter to name names in the Jeffrey Epstein sex abuse scandal, along with political content about Trump's national emergency declaration.
